rows.label: bf04270100_0015
rows.name:
There was indeed once a factory there.
However, it was abandoned some thirty years ago.

rows.label: bf04270100_0030
rows.name: We can't be certain unless we investigate.

rows.label: bf04270100_0060
rows.name:
We won't do anything reckless. If it seems
dangerous, we'll turn back. How's that sound?

rows.label: bf04270100_0080
rows.name:
To tell the truth, it would be difficult for me to
dispatch the military so quickly. Would you?

rows.label: bf04270100_0100
rows.name: Now, let me share what information I have found.

rows.label: bf04270100_0110
rows.name:
There are rumors about town that an esteemed
Nopon merchant is involved in this affair.

rows.label: bf04270100_0140
rows.name:
Well, we're currently searching the transaction records.
If we find anything, we will inform you.

rows.label: bf04270100_0160
rows.name:
I don't deny it. I will head to the location myself
as soon as I am able to mobilize some troops.
